instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-01700: What is 820-01700? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01700</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A  "Fans full throttle"
threads.message:
The coils for the GPU buck converter are glowing on thermal.   I usually don't notice buck converter coils glowing like this but I have little experience with this board and I don't have anything I can reference against.

Unit came in for "throttling fans at full speed"   Unit was pretty dusty and I cleaned it.
Unable

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01700</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A  "Fans full throttle"
threads.message:
Do you get video?
If CPU core comes up, check for USB activity at least.
